org.s1.weboperation

Class MapWebOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.s1.weboperation.WebOperation<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Object>>
      • org.s1.weboperation.MapWebOperation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandWebOperation, ExpImpWebOperation, MonitorOperation, ObjectSchemaWebOperation, TableWebOperation, UploadWebOperation, UserOperation

    public abstract class MapWebOperation
extends WebOperation<Map<String,Object>,Map<String,Object>>
    Base class for Map-in/Map-out web operations
